name: The World's Equilibrium Cannot Be Maintained Forever
text:
Main You may rest 5 of your DON!! cards: if the only Characters on your field are (Celestial Dragons) type Characters, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with base cost 6 or less.
